summary: This week I added a feedback system so you can send thoughts directly from the landing page, and gave the vine illustration on the homepage a softer, more organic entrance. I also rebuilt the admin dashboard text for better legibility in dark mode and fixed a handful of bugs, including one that was causing stale post counts on your stats page.
